```{r}
spain <- read_csv("https://pollofpolls.eu/get/polls/ES-parliament/format/csv")

good_firms <- spain %>%
  group_by(firm) %>%
  count() %>%
  filter(n >= 40) %>% 
  pull(firm)

data_to_plot <- spain %>% 
  filter(firm %in% good_firms, 
         date >= "2018-01-05", 
         date <= "2018-12-27")
```
